name: Nøkk

biography.description: Nøkk uses the HEL Presence Reduction to reduce noise and hide from observation tools, allowing her to move undetected.

gameplayTips: Use the HEL Presence Reduction to sneak past cameras and drones undetected.
Coordinate with teammates to capitalize on your stealth capabilities.
Be mindful of the ability's duration and cooldown to maximize its effectiveness.
